result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ga: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.html: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí láċ i dtús báire aċ d'aṫraiġ sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.

result.html: D'athraigh sí a hainmShe changed her name.
result.ponchtml: D'aṫraiġ sí a hainmShe changed her name.

result.html: Tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shinThings have changed since then.
result.ponchtml: Tá cúrsaí aṫraiṫe ó ẛinThings have changed since then.

result.eng: The second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ga: D'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.orig: D'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.html: D'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreachThe second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ponchtml: D'aṫraiġ an dara ionsaí an tír láiṫreaċThe second attack changed the country instantly.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
